Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util

Enum Class BlockFace

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<BlockFace>
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.BlockFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<BlockFace>, Constable
public enum BlockFace extends Enum<BlockFace>
Represents the 6 faces of a cube.
Author:
Pim

    • rotateClockwise

      public static BlockFace rotateClockwise(BlockFace myFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in clockwise direction from a perspective of looking down on the world. For example, NORTH would return EAST.
      Parameters:
      myFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • rotateCounterClockwise

      public static BlockFace rotateCounterClockwise(BlockFace myFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in counterclockwise direction from a perspective of looking down on the world. For example, NORTH would return WEST.
      Parameters:
      myFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • rotateVerticallyNorth

      public static BlockFace rotateVerticallyNorth(BlockFace curFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in northern direction on the vertical plane. For example, UP would return NORTH and NORTH would return DOWN.
      Parameters:
      curFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • rotateVerticallySouth

      public static BlockFace rotateVerticallySouth(BlockFace curFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in southern direction on the vertical plane. For example, UP would return SOUTH and SOUTH would return DOWN.
      Parameters:
      curFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • rotateVerticallyEast

      public static BlockFace rotateVerticallyEast(BlockFace curFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in eastern direction on the vertical plane. For example, UP would return EAST and EAST would return DOWN.
      Parameters:
      curFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • rotateVerticallyWest

      public static BlockFace rotateVerticallyWest(BlockFace curFace)
      Rotate the BlockFace in western direction on the vertical plane. For example, UP would return WEST and WEST would return DOWN.
      Parameters:
      curFace - The current BlockFace.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.

    • getDirFun

      @Nullable public static @Nullable UnaryOperator<BlockFace> getDirFun(MovementDirection movementDirection)
      Get the appropriate function for rotating a BlockFace. Different rotation directions use different methods.
      Parameters:
      movementDirection - The MovementDirection to rotate in.
      Returns:
      The appropriate function for rotating the BlockFace in the given direction.

    • rotate

      public static BlockFace rotate(BlockFace blockFace, int steps, UnaryOperator<BlockFace> dir)
      Rotate a block face in a given direction for a number of steps.
      Parameters:
      blockFace - The BlockFace that will be rotated.
      steps - The number of times to apply the rotation.
      dir - The function the applies the rotation.
      Returns:
      The rotated BlockFace.
